reporter_caption.center: IN RE PETITION OF RUSSO, 112 R.I. 919 (1973)

caption.center: IN RE PETITION OF VITO N. RUSSO.

opinion.posture: Petition to permit petitioner to attend a local accredited law school or authorize the warden of the Adult Correctional Institutions to permit him to take a correspondence course for the purpose of qualifying for the bar examinations is referred to the Board of Bar Examiners for its consideration.
opinion.attorneys: Vito N. Russo, petitioner, pro se.
